## ComponentManager.addComponent() method

Adds a component.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addComponent(componentInfo: ComponentDatum, opt_allowOverrides?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  componentInfo | ComponentDatum | The data for the component to register. |
|  opt\_allowOverrides | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> True to prevent an error when overriding an already registered item. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
